website_summaries.verdict: It’s an affordable, space-efficient, and securely fitting desktop Apple Watch charging stand that is especially great for anyone who prefers a bulkier case.
pros: Notched design makes for handy cable management
Silicone pad keeps Apple Watch firmly in place
cons: Of course, this is only a stand, and won’t help you without the official Apple Watch charger

customer_reviews.title: Spigen Apple Watch Stand is preferred
customer_reviews.text: I bought both this Spigen Night Stand and the Orzly one, since I could not decide online. I used both stand for 4 nights each. I ended up selecting the Spigen as the keeper for these reasons: the Spigen takes up much less space on my night stand, the Spigen does not require permanent adhesive to stick in place and the Spigen does not put a sharp bend in the charge cable, and has two placement options out each side. My pictures show the side by side size difference. Used both products, both do the job, but I like the Spigen model much more.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. McDonough

customer_reviews.title: A 1 star product for 44mm AW4
customer_reviews.text: I have a new 44mm Apple Watch. If you look closely when it's on this stand, you'll see the Watch and charging disk do not line up perfectly. The Spiegen stand was made for the previous 42mm Watch dimensions. On Amazon, Spiegen says it's compatible with the new 44mm AW4. I disagree. My AW4 "sorta" works with this stand. Some nights the Watch constantly pings as it disconnects and reconnects to the charging stand because the connection between the charging disk and Watch is compromised. Spiegen needs to redesign it for the 44mm AW4 if they want their customers to not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Charging puck doesn't stay put.
customer_reviews.text: The charging puck doesn't stay put inside the stand. Even if you install it perfectly snug, after 15 minutes or so, the bottom part of the charging puck will pop out.
customer_reviews.author: R. Go

customer_reviews.title: A fan of other Spigen products, but this stand is complete garbage.
customer_reviews.text: A fan of Spigen products, but this stand is complete garbage. The Apple Watch charger pops out of the stand constantly. I press it back into the stand, place my watch on the stand, and go to bed; By the time I wake up in the morning the charger has popped out, thus my watch didn't charge over the night. It's like the stand is slowly pushing the charger back out, as it's a tight fit, possibly to tight. I normally like Spigen products. Their cases are nice, and their wireless charge stands are good, but this Apple Watch stand is just useless. It has 1 thing its suppose to do, and it fails to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Charger falls out
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this product but sorely disappointed. I’m not sure what went wrong but each night I would ensure that the charger was tightly wedged into the hole with nothing pulling on it- when I woke up in the morning, the charger would be dislodged/completely out of the stand and my Apple Watch would not get charged :( I use it on a small metal side table so I’m not sure if that contributed at all. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Alyse F.

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Charger would not stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because the magnetic charger would not stay in place in the holder. I have a 44 Series 4 Apple Watch and this charge stand looked like a great idea. I have had great results with Spigen products in the past. Unfortunately, the round magnetic charger would not stay in the hole. I re-seated it several times, and every time the charger stand was just so tight that the charger would be pushed out of the stand. I could not use it because within 5 minutes the charger would become detached from the watch, and would not charge the watch.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Crappy Apple Charger
customer_reviews.text: Crap product will NOT HOLD Apple charger! What a complete POC? Have no idea how people give this a positive review. I’ve tried for about FOUR days and every day, the charging magneto keeps getting pushed back out the back. Crap design and completely worthless. Will have to superglue it in to ‘make’ this junk work. GMADB...
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: If you have a case on your watch, it won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this stand. Built well and just all around good. But then I went to charge my watch which has a case on it. The stand does not allow the white disc of the charger to come through enough to compensate for a case on the watch. If I squeeze the case and the watch with its case together hard it will start to charge. As long as you don’t use any case on your watch, it will work. If you do have a case on your watch, don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Single-use disposable item
customer_reviews.text: Not a well designed item. This item is inexpensive and disposable, and the quality reflects this. I placed this stand on my nightime dresser. When I tried to move it's location, the bottom pad was stuck to the tabletop. Initially, the pad became completely detached from the plastic body, which is not surprising, since the pad is glued onto the body where the contact points are mostly hollow. When I finally managed to peel off the pad off my dresser, you can see that the bottom surface is completely torn. This is a single-time use item. I threw this in the trash and bought the official Apple Watch Magnetic Stand for full price, instead. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the charger in place.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of the spigen S350’s - one in pink sand the other in black. The pink sand stand will hold both our magnetic chargers. The black one however, constantly keeps pushing the charger out of the cut out COMPLETELY. It doesn’t just nudge out, the cord will be completely separated from the stand after FIRMLY pressing into the stand. Not happy, and wish to have a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: N & C

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This device simply does not work as advertised. The Apple charging disk once inserted within this stand will stay in place for a short time and will then begin to back itself out of the stand, causing the watch to stop charging. It’s quite annoying to wake up in the morning expecting a fully charged watch only to find that the watch lost charger contact and stopped charging during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great stand, but must use Apple brand charger. Off brands are too big.
customer_reviews.text: Item works as intended and is very simple. Cheap but gets the job done. The sticky bottom is great for keeping it on my night stand. I ordered two of these, one for work and one for home. The first one, worked great. I put in the charger that came with my watch and it fit perfectly. Since this stand doesn’t come with a charger, I ordered one that was recommended. The non-name brand charger did not work and was too big to fit on the holder. That’s the only reason I gave it four stars. So be warned...you need actual Apple charger to use this stand properly. Or at least a charger that is the exact same size.
customer_reviews.author: Manders511

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Apple Watch Series 4 (44 MM)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with a new Apple Watch 4. Although it is advertised as working with the series 4 watch, the opening to hold the magnetic charger is not large enough to accommodate the magnetic charger shipped with the 44 mm series 4 Apple Watch. I tried the stand with the magnetic charger shipped with an earlier series/smaller watch and it fit (Apple apparently increased the size of the charger with the newer, larger watches). The quality of the stand is very good and I’ll keep it to use with my older watch.
customer_reviews.author: BWM San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't reliably charge 44mm Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: This stand seemed fine at first, but after a few weeks (inconveniently after the return window closed) I started to notice that it doesn't connect as reliably as it should. If the cable gets bumped, the charger shifts inside and the watch doesn't get a connection even though it's correctly positioned on the charger. Everything looks fine, but the watch doesn't charge. It doesn't happen every time, and I can prevent it by checking it carefully when I set the watch down. But realistically it still happens sometimes and that is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold charging disk so inconsistent charging.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a simple device. I have a different brand Apple watch stand that works fine, but was concerned that it bends the cable at the junction with the charging disk. This stand has a cut-out for the cable which I thought was a good design, BUT, the disk does not want to stay in place. The disk wants to slide back and eventually loses connection with the watch so the watch ends up dying during the following day. At first this was once in a while. Now the whole disk falls out the back. Both charging cables I tried were Apple OEM cables. I have to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: YLFGratiot

customer_reviews.title: Worth it to hold your watch charger.
customer_reviews.text: This is a holder for your Apple Watch charger. It puts your watch upright so you can see it, but requires that you tap the watch or near it to wake it up. Not the holders fault, just the watches limitations. It “sticks” to your nightstand so it doesn’t slide around. I use it every night to charge my watch. It would be difficult to move it around due to the sticky bottom, so using it for travel might not work great, but you can pop out the Apple charger and leave this base when you want.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased or Not

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this Apple Watch dock. It’s small and simple. And it has a sticky bottom so you can secure it to a surface if needed. BUT the circular part for the charger does not hold it in place. It is very difficult to squish it in there, which is to be expected. What I was no prepared for is that the charger works it’s way back out of the circular hole. I have the cord in the cord spot and I pushed the charger in ALL THE WAY. But after about 5-10 minutes it’s worked it’s way out so far that it will not charge. Completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Not for series 4
customer_reviews.text: It does not hold the charger in the slot. Charger kept sliding out. Returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Not Compatible with the Spigen Rugged Armor Case
customer_reviews.text: Having the Spigen Rugged Armor watch case for the Apple Watch Series 3, you would assume that this Spigen charging stand would go perfectly with it. Well, I was totally wrong. You have to bend the stand a little bit just to get it to charge. But after a short time, the stand will go back to its original form and lose contact with the charger and stop charging. The stand is only good for Apple watches that are either bare or with a really thin case.
customer_reviews.author: Louie Y.

customer_reviews.title: An Ineffective Charging Device
customer_reviews.text: This is merely a stand into which an Apple Watch charger disk can be wedged. It looks good but it is difficult to get a good "mating" between the watch and the disk when using this little stand. Several times I thought it was charging when it wasn't. Plus - it is a negative for traveling because you either have to take the whole set-up (a bit bulky) or you must remove the charging disk from the holder to take just the charger along with you. Neither option is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Phi

customer_reviews.title: Destroys Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically beautiful, but the bottom ruined my night stand. The bottom of the stand somehow permanently stuck to my $400 night stand-up causing me to have to spend money to resurface it. The adhesive holding the non stick pass to the stand also comes off. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Simsy512

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: since the stand doesn’t “spit” my charger out I love this stand!! *********************************************************** The hole is too small for the charger. Almost immediately after inserting the charger comes bright out. Making it utterly useless!
customer_reviews.author: Traneka Holland

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function Work Very Well for this Watch Stand.
customer_reviews.text: The simplicity of the design and construction of the, is testimony to the minimalist lifestyle, I am learning to embrace. Unlike its predecessor, this stand doesn't require that I gingerly place the watch on the stand and then balance the two halves of the band while hoping that the stand doesn't slide off the night stand. The non-permanent adhesive on the bottom of the stand keeps it in place. Once you put the watch near the magnetic puck, it literally pulls the watch into the right place with no worries. It is a masterful combination of good design and great price. I recommend this to all Apple Watch users.
customer_reviews.author: Geepeegee

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Apple Watch charger, but the suction pad needs work
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple design and when stuck down it stays in place. I've had to move it a few times and the last time the suction pad came loose from the holder. That revealed that the simply isn't much surface for the pad to stick to, just a short section of flat plastic at the front, everything other surface is a thin ribbing for structural support. The pad reattaches without complaint, but if the bottom of the stand was a solid flat surface everywhere I suspect that the suction pad would stay attached to the stand when removing it from the surface it is stuck to, like a table.
customer_reviews.author: P. G. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: notice the nice angle backward of the stand to place your watch
customer_reviews.text: As others have share, the apple charger pod is pushed out of the stand. Here are photos of the charger being pushed out. First pic is just the stand without the charger in place, notice the nice angle backward of the stand to place your watch. Second picture is with the charger pod in place, notice how far forward the stand is pushed by inserting the charger pod. After waiting about a minute or two, the third picture shows the charger pod being pushed out. Last photo is of the charger pod after it was pushed out. Returning this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: QuadD

customer_reviews.title: Good idea if it worked
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of the Spigen Apple Watch Stand. The ability to set for a watch with a large case was very appealing as that's what I use. Putting the Apple magnetic charger in the slot took some effort, should make it difficult to remove. Unfortunately the magnet works it's way loose in about 20 minutes or less. I've tried everything I can think of, more than once, with the same result. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Base is too sticky
customer_reviews.text: Holds the watch nicely and the item itself is solidly constructed but the base material, the part that touches the nightstand, though it's not sticky to the touch (it's not adhesive at all) it is so sticky on a surface that the whole base pad comes off anytime I try to move it. It even sticks to a vertical surface! Yesterday it stuck to the nightstand so bad that it left behind pieces of the pad when I finally was able to peel it off. Not sure if it would work better on a different surface but our varnished wood nightstand is a no go. Still a decent product for the price but the sticky pad needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: Shortbus

customer_reviews.title: Can’t get it to work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason, no natter how I position the charger, this stand either does not connect with my series 3 42mm or, when it does, it causes charging to take very much longer than it does without the stand. I have tried both with and without the silicone insert. The adhesive is very good and repositionable but that doesn’t do much if I can’t use the product as intended. As it is now, the stand really just holds my charger so it doesn’t slide off my nightstand and I remove the charger from it to recharge my watch every day. It’s nicely made, just doesn’t want to work for me.
customer_reviews.author: CDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose quite well, but be aware that it does not have charging capability on its own
customer_reviews.text: I like this stand very much for my Apple Watch 3 and use it routinely for overnight charging. It is much more convenient than placing the magnetic charger originally included with the watch on the back of the watch. BE ADVISED: this product is just a stand; it is not a charger on its own. You must fit your existing charger into the stand for it to charge. Probably my bad for not reading the description thoroughly, but I did not realize this when I purchased the product. I was disappointed when I realized it wasn't a standalone charger; however, I still find this product very useful and am satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: T Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Two BIG issues.......
customer_reviews.text: 1. The stand DOES NOT WORK with the Spigen protector (Spigen Rugged Armor ). The watch will NOT charge with the protector on in the stand. Find it crazy that the stand is not compatible with their other protect. 2. The stand function is flawed by the watch itself........the clock does not remain on while in the stand. So if you think it’s Going to function as night stand clock .........the watch is not capable of displaying the time while charging. Maybe Apple will change that feature In future. Returning the stand keeping the Spigen Rugged Armor case cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with a Series 4
customer_reviews.text: When placing the charging puck and associated cable you will need to ensure the cable snaps in and the puck is in snug. The puck has not popped out like others - must be manufacturing tolerances in the stand or variations in the puck size from Apple. Would give it 5-stars if it were not for a slightly awkward placement of the watch on the stand. Would want the watch to angle slightly backward and have tried to bend it so but with the stand made out of rubber it returns to vertical. That said it works, the puck stays in, the watch doesn't fall out, and it's inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: SpiderX

customer_reviews.title: Puck doesn't stay in the holder..
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this stand but so far for me it's not functional. The puck does fall out and I have installed the charging puck a number of times which seems to be a great snug fit but alas it pops out and my watch doesn't charge. I've actually considered using super glue to hold the charging puck in place but that seems a little excessive and should not be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: David Mazzola

customer_reviews.title: They must've changed the design--charger keeps popping out.
customer_reviews.text: When the Apple Watch s2 came out, we purchased 2 of these stands. They worked (and still do) flawlessly. A friend of mine recently purchased a new watch and I got her one of these stands for her. The must have changed the design because the charger circle keeps popping out. Returned. Disappointed, because I really like this stand :(
customer_reviews.author: L. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging a no brainer
customer_reviews.text: This little stand is perfect for my bathroom counter. It helps me remember to place my watch on it before showering, or getting ready for the day/night etc to give the watch that boost it needs to make it through the day. Once it is on the counter it holds very well in place. Note, you do need to have a separate watch charging cord, as this is just the stand/holder. It has an insert for the smaller apple watch, but ours is constantly used with both sizes and I have not put the insert in. The magnet holds the smaller watch in place just fine. Would recommend for a bathroom, night stand, or desk!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ham

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!  Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes charging your apple watch much easier. The only thing I noticed is you must push the actual charger "the magnet circle" through the whole in the stand and make it slightly stick out the front side of the stand. If you don't do this and you leave the "magnet circle" flush in the hole the watch will not always charge or start charging and then you wake up in the morning to see that the watch never charged. After figuring this out, I have not had one issue with the stand and I love it. Hope this helps someone that might be having my same issue when i first got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it !!!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $10. It’s literally a piece of silicon that holds your watch upright. So lightweight that it slides off any table. They put an adhesive film on the bottom but who wants to glue that to a nightstand? I’d buy if it was 2 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend because she never has anywhere to easily charge her Apple Watch. Let me tell you, this little thing works awesome! It’s so simple yet durable and easy to take with you. It also makes the ‘night stand’ mode on the Apple Watch work as a miniature clock. If you have an Apple Watch then you know how annoying it is to charge it because of how awkward the charger is. This is a must buy
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love and owned several products by Spigen. They are solidly built and well designed. This is no different. The rubber/plastics feels pliable and durable. But I have a difficult time getting my Apple Watch just right for the charging to begin. Every night it would require several times in removing and placing the watch back on the stand to get the charging going. That is usually the last thing you want to deal with at bedtime. I can't say it is poorly design nor a bad product. It simply does not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: WHC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly for Apple Watch Series 5
customer_reviews.text: I had the Spigen night stand (exact same product) 3 years ago for my Series 2 watch and it work perfectly. Therefore when I got the Series 5 recently, I decided to get the same stand again - assuming that it would work just like the previous one. However it does NOT! somehow the charging disk loses it's contact with the watch and stops charging. When you force the disk inside the stand and re-seat the watch it will work for some time, and then stop again. This also means that the tap to show time also does not work. very disappointing! Something is not right. I'm afraid I have to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lejuj

customer_reviews.title: Charger doesn't stay in stand
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but I was very disappointed and will be returning it. My charger pops out and won't stay put so my watch won't charge in this stand. I didn't realize the issue for a few days because it pops out slowly overnight so your watch won't charge and the next day it will be dead. I was extremely disappointed with the design flaw because this stand literally has one job!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Drobner

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, something just didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product and the concept of it. Unfortunately my watch wouldn't charge on the stand. I also have a case around my watch, so that may have been the limiting factor. The customer service rep I spoke with was very polite, so that was greatly appreciated. I think if you don't use a bumper case, this will be a great device for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shawndiego18

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work reliably with 40mm Series 4
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to work reliably with series 4. Have woken up many times to discharged watch. Even if the charging sign comes up sometimes it stops charging after a while and discharges through the night. Not very happy. I am a big fan of spigen but they should clarify this is NOT the best stand for new generation watches.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t allow your Watch to fully charge.
customer_reviews.text: Design is cool but functionality is a 0 out of 10. When placing your watch on this stand, it WILL NOT let your watch fully charge. We had it over 2 weeks and would leave it charging on the stand for hours and would only charge +10%. There is a small gap where the watch is placed this not allowing fill contact for charging.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wallstreet

customer_reviews.title: Good basic charging stand
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several of the expensive iWatch charging stands, so I figured I would give this simple little thing a try. After playing with if for a couple of days I found that for me the silver ring on the iWatch Charger had to be pushed out from the base for the charging to start and my watch band had to be open, but once I got that setup then the holder seems to do a great job holding the watch in place while it charges. I would mention that the current watch band I have on my 42mm iWatch is a thicker band so a thinner band might need t have to be open completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sticky pad doesn’t work everywhere, but stand is still good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a watch stand for the car, where I do the lion’s share of my device charging. The charger fits into the stand perfectly, and the watch sits well without having to open up the band. I was hoping the sticky pad would be enough to keep it in place, but alas, that rubbery pad in the charging area of the Tesla Model 3 is exactly the type of surface that the Spigen will not stick to at all. 3M foam sticky stuff to the rescue! Now the stand (and watch) stay put, even at highway speeds, or over NYC potholes.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Had to throw it out. It feels well built and durable. However once the charger was installed in it, the watch would not charge. I guess the charging surface was too far away and did not make enough contact with the back of the watch. Oh well. Using the charger as it comes from apple does not bother me anyway. I just wish I had not wasted the money on this...
customer_reviews.author: Javier Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Well-meaning, but doesn't work with my Series 4 40mm
customer_reviews.text: This stand is quite simple, but in practice, quite superfluous, even if it did work reliably, which it doesn't. I couldn't get my watch to maintain good contact with the charging disc, and even if I could get it working I'd be worried about the impact of a weak connection. In practice in the months since I've used this, I just attach the charger and put the watch on its side and call it a day. Haven't needed the stand at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cordeiro

customer_reviews.title: My Honest Opinion
customer_reviews.text: So I was tired of Apple Watch disconnecting and laying flat. I looking in to a couple different style of stands. If you are looking for something just for the watch then this is your go to item. It's very sturdy. Has a snug fit for the actual cable to holds to quiet well. The adhesive on the bottom of it will hold the stand in place nicely. You can use any size Apple Watch on it because it has a little padding you can add for the smaller sizes. Its small and compact good for traveling with and being used as a night stand clock. I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes doesn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: I have all spigen products to protect all of my apple gear from Apple Watch, AirPods and my iPhone. This charging base seems to work great but every once in awhile it loses connection and I hear the watch make the ding that it has been connected to a charger even though it’s been on it for hours. Some mornings I wake up and it hasn’t charged. Have to remove the spigen case from watch to charge on spigen charging holder doesn’t make much sense. Only downfall and it’s kinda a big one.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is surprisingly sticky without being an adhesive. It really sticks to my nightstand well. Takes a decent amount of force to pull it off, but leaves absolutely no make or residue. Nice because most things like this slide or tip from the weight of the cord or watch. This one doesn’t budge. The only issue is the watch needs to be placed perfectly but you get used to it and it’s easy enough to do.
customer_reviews.author: DuckJ13

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but does not charge my phone correctly
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks great and it worked perfectly for the first couple of weeks, then I took it on a trip and it seems to have lost its shape and now I place my watch on the stand and I have to fiddle with the watch until it starts charging. Then the next morning I usually realize that it only charged for a couple of minutes and the charger got misaligned and my watch has no battery for the day. Please spend a few more dollars and get something more sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: L. Larrea

customer_reviews.title: Great simple charging solution
customer_reviews.text: Simple solution. Works great for nightstand view anremovrs the need to undo bands to lay flat for charging. The adhesive on the bottom is really sticky. I was expecting more of a rubber almost suction type, but it’s not. Be careful where you place it because it does not move easily. Mine had to be peeled up and left some material on my nightstand. It was easily cleaned up, but definitely unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: amazonjunkie

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD DESIGN charge puck not held properly...
customer_reviews.text: The charging puck doesn't fit properly and will not stay put inside the stand. Even installed it perfectly snug, after 5 minutes or so the charger puck starts to come out and when you pull off your watch it comes off the stand. Bought this because I got the case from Spigen as well and was sure they would be compatible -Not even a little because the stand does not hold the charging puck which pops out.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: good quality product with a low price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and cheap alternative to the pricier chargers. You use your own cord and this looks way better than having your cord sitting on your nightstand. It also prevents those annoying times where you grab your watch only to have your cord fall to the floor since your watch isn't weighing it down. The sticky part on the bottom is easily refreshed by running some water over it or using a bit of soap with water to make it sticky again. Once stuck to a surface the effect is really strong and your charger won't be knocked over unintentionally.
customer_reviews.author: Inswichlicuor

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a series 3 Iwatch. The items was easy to open, so not complaints there. I did have a difficult time fitting the charger into the opening. When I finally was able to fit the charger, I had connection issues with the watch. Sometimes I would find the charger fallen out of the holder. I personally would not recommend this for the iwatch series 3. With the price tag not worth my time to return.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design, works great
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my wired to wireless charging for my X so I wasn't going to be using my bamboo watch/iphone stand. Instead, I use a Anker wireless stand (not pad) and got this for my iwatch. It is simple but VERY well engineered. The original charger fits within and the cord guides well. The watch sits easily and the sticky bottom (but not glue) holds it and makes it appear heavier than it is so it doesn't move when I pick it up or drop it. Very well thought out and super low price. HIGHLY recommend such a well engineered stand.
customer_reviews.author: Chanimal

customer_reviews.title: A simple and well made solution
customer_reviews.text: The concept behind this is terribly simple, but easy to mess up. Yet, in this case the manufacturer nails it perfectly. The watch's charger locks into the back and stays firmly in place. The tray holds the 42 mm size as it comes, and had a soft spacer to add if you have the 38 mm size. Each night I drop my watch onto it and then see the clock face light up after I see the charge icon appear. The tactile base also resists moving. This is a simple and well designed item that I cannot find one problem with. For such a price I would not hesitate to purchase one again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Spigen comes through again
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased multiple products from Spigen to include screen protectors, Phone cases, and now a apple watch stand. I have not been disappointed by a single product. This watch stand is good quality for the price. Comes with a little piece to raise the watch up depending on the series you have. I only had 1 issue. When taking the plastic off the bottom of the stand a little piece of the rubber stuck to it when removing it but was small enough that it caused no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive bottom falling apart
customer_reviews.text: After 1 & 1/2 years of use, the bottom adhesive pad is shredded and falling apart. It stays in place really well, but it isn't really reusable where you can move it around like it claims. I've only moved it maybe 4 times. I do like the pink color, but it has stained over time and looks dingy now. Also, I really hate the small plastic piece sent that you have to use if you have the 38mm Apple Watch. It looks awful and makes the stand look kinda crappy.
customer_reviews.author: nat.ann29

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my cord in place
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a stocking stuffer an REALLY love that it keeps my charging cable up and off the ground. You can adjust which side the cord snaps into the back, making it adaptable to whatever side of the bed you sleep on. I also like that since the charging cord is snapped into place I never have to worry if I put my watch on the wrong magnetic side for charging. I haven’t tried the adhesive bottom, I have a wood nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: A-Mama

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing! So much I had to buy two!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It really is so convenient that I really don’t remember what life was like before it. I keep mine right next to my bed and every time before bed I just pop off my watch and just place it on my little watch caddy. It’s also super helpful when your watch is in alarm clock ⏰ mode you can see it across the room without having to hover of it. My wife liked mine so much I had to end up buying her one too!
customer_reviews.author: June Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to do a return request on this product. My new Apple Watch wasn't charging completely because of the way this stand is designed (it says it's for Series 5 but the sensor wasn't matching up). I figured out it was because the hole for the magnetic charger and stand weren't flush and that's why it was getting maybe a 1/2 charge overnight. If you don't have a Series 5, this is probably a great option. It's a great price, the stand has this adhesion thing at the bottom that doesn't slide. It just wasn't made for the new Apple Watch. :(
customer_reviews.author: LNM

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Super solid and smart design for cable and apple charger (you supply). I have the 44mm Watch 5 series and it works great. It also includes a thin silicone strip if you have the 38mm watch (older series). Overall, a great stand. Edit: Bought a Spigen watch cover thinking it would be OK. Even though it's only a mm or less thick, it does not align with the charger without some fiddling. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little stand for not a lot of money. It’s nice to not have to lay my watch out flat to charge it, and the 3 has the nightstand feature that engages when you charge on this stand. It comes with a sticky pad to hold it in place on your nightstand, and it’s pretty grippy but also easy to pull loose when you want to move it. Stable and doesn’t tip over. You do have to make sure that the watch is positioned just right on the stand, otherwise you’ll wake up in the morning w the same battery charge you had the night before
customer_reviews.author: Chad L

customer_reviews.title: Had to insert the charger backwards
customer_reviews.text: I found that my watch didn’t make full contact for charging when I put the charger in facing the front as I have a thin protective case on the watch. So I turned the charger around and put it backwards, placed my watch on the back of the stand and it charges just fine. Not a problem with the stand, it’s just not made for those of us with protective cases on our watches. I still made it work and it does just fine. It’s well made and should last a long time. Price is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Sandorae

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful accessory for my Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the reviews where people take the time to discuss the product in some depth. This way I can decide if this is the product I want to purchase myself. Based on one of those reviews, I purchased this product, and I could not be happier. My watch sits right next to my bed where I can see the time if I need to. I can't imagine that I will have durability problems with the product, so I will just indicate that this product will be with me for years to come. It holds my watch in place and functions exactly as it needs to function.
customer_reviews.author: smithirowa

customer_reviews.title: Works and is small
customer_reviews.text: I think it works ok. Nice and small. I wish it would be easier to tell which side is which when attaching watch.Failed to notice and of course watch not charged in morning. If you are tired and realize you still have your watch on it is difficult to tell which side is the charging side. They should make opposite side obvious by feel so you don't need to turn on the lights.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok Apple Watch Stand
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this watch stand, but there is a hole in the back for the magnetic charger and it doesn't stay put far enough in to where it will stay connected to the watch. There is a nice grip on the bottom of it and where the watch rests on the stand. Overall, I would've loved this more if I knew of a way to secure the charger in the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: The quality of material and fit are pleasantly surprising. I like how the rubberized bottom pad keeps it in one place. I like how satisfying it is to place the watch with one hand onto the stand -- much more convenient and intuitive than using the Apple magnetic charger without any dock or stand (which inevitably requires two hands). It turns out I am more likely to charge my watch now, because it's easier and simpler to place it on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: I. Kim

customer_reviews.title: So good I ended up buying two.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought one for use in both home and travel, but after I pulled the plastic off the adhesive it was “....well, screw that idea.” Bought another brand for travel but was severely disappointed as the charger just wouldn’t stay put, so I went ahead and bought another Spigen but am gonna keep the plastic on the adhesive this time around. Keeps the cable and watch in place, does as advertised, HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scope

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea but it doesn't quite work for my 44mm gen4 apple watch. It wont seem to reliably charge my watch. It comes disconnected very easily. Ill leave it on for hours and come back and its only 30% charged because it wont stay connected. Im back to just using the cord by itself. This might work for other versions of the apple watch but my series 4 44mm doesn’t work with it very well.
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not reliable
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and very has a minimalist styling, but in my case, the stand doesn’t keep the charging cable magnet in place or the watch occasionally comes unaligned so it doesn’t always charge. It is cumbersome to constantly have to check to see if it is doing what it’s supposed to. I generally like spigen products, but this one needs a little more work on the design.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient for nightstand - sticks stong to tabletop, holds watch well
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cook because it stands my watch up overnight and holds on to it. I drop the watch off at night and pick it up in the morning. It is quite sticky although it doesn't seem like it if you touch the sticky stuff. I placed it the first day and it hasn't moved since then. It has like a gel sticky bottom. I can't say enough about how much I appreciate this simple thing item. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: COST-EFFECTIVE APPLE WATCH NIGHT STAND
customer_reviews.text: The Spigen S350 Apple Watch Stand is a simple and inexpensive device that allows one to do a nightly recharge of an the watch, placing it into a horizontal position that allows it to function as a miniature clock. This is useful if you plan to use it as a substitute alarm clock. It also keeps the watch from getting knocked onto the floor. There are other, more elaborate devices available, but the Spigen watch stand handles the issue of what to do with the Apple Watch effectively and cost-efficiently. RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Birnbaum

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Spigen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiancée after I got her an Apple Watch so se could use the nightstand function, and because I've be so impressed. With spigen products for their dirt cheap prices. We'll chalk another one up to spigen, because it's simple, does exactly what it says, and she uses it every night. All you do is stick your magnetic charger in there, run the wire where you see in the pic, plug it in, and wrap your watch on it at night and your golden! Spigen is simple and straightforward, and that's why I get their stuff when I need an easy solution,
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: HINT to keep it working...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You have to really push the charging puck in all the way to work. UPDATE: I’ve been using it now for 2 months and the “sticky” material on the base is no longer keeping it firm/solid on my night stand. The SOLUTION was a very simple fix. Take a wet rag and gently wipe the sticky stuff on the bottom. Also wipe the surface you are putting the dock on and voila, good as new!!!
customer_reviews.author: LSands

customer_reviews.title: Not for all watch bands.
customer_reviews.text: My watch barely fits because I have a 38mm watch and Apple sport loop band so make sure if you plan to buy this that your band sticks straight out to the side or you have the 42mm watch. I imagine ti would work better with the silicone bands. I got it to charge my watch, I just have to make sure it gets set on it properly. I like that base can be stuck on and then washed and reused.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice charger stand, not necessary, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to use display. Adheres strongly to my night stand, easy to pop the watch on without looking at night. Not a necessity but a cool accessory to go with the watch. If you have a 38 or 40mm watch, don't throw away the little foam strip, you'll need to install it to make it line up right. I got mine a little crooked, but it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. K.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Holds the charger magnet tight. Locks the watch right even with a bigger full case style band. Don’t even need to use the sticky bottom which I might add the people who had it stuck to stuff and leave of a mark must have done something to expose it to leaving residue because it’s like a tacky rubber that’s not actually sticky. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Sticky pad on the bottom solves my biggest complaint, which was my watch constantly sliding off my nightstand. The charging puck that came with my series 2 watch fits very securely. I was a little worried about how the watch is held at an angle so the band isn’t resting on anything. But even with my stainless steel strap hanging off the back, The magnet of the charger holds it securely.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: It was much smaller than I expected but is actually a good size. Compact and fits my Apple Watch 38mm series 3 well. I used the extra strip that was included for the 38 but I think I would not have needed it. I also use the snap bumpers and they do not interfere with the stand. The stand stays in place. The instructions say that you can move it but you need to wet the back for it to stick again. Haven’t tried that yet to check if that is accurate or not. Overall, I like it and since it is small it does not take up space on my nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the range product
customer_reviews.text: Work as intended best describes the product. The issue I have with it is the charging puck that goes into comes out easily. Not sure why that is but as lay my watch on the dock it will push the charging puck out and eventually falling out. I stopped using it and didn't care to go through the process of returning. It's convening to lay my watch directly on the charger puck that messing with the dock. cheap price middle of the road results.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: Also I like that it’s small
customer_reviews.text: This is the charging stand that should have came from apple. It fits the charging magnet perfectly, and although I didn’t want to completely stick it to my nightstand, I rubbed the bottom of it on a blanket to attract some lint. It’s sticky enough not to slide around but doesn’t STICK Lol. Also I like that it’s small, and not the bigger, upright stands that are out there. Plastic doesn’t feel cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: nickersonmn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The Apple watch charger fits ok into this stand but doesn't extend far enough and most of the time the watch quits charging. I left the watch on this stand with the Apple charger in place for over an hour and it never charged. I now have to place it on the charger outside this stand to charge it. This was a waste of money. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: rsfrid

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy with this charging stand. First, the Watch will not stay in place to charge. The stand does not allow the Watch to sit properly to connect to the charging surface. After several tries, we ended up attaching it with a small rubber band. After 2 hours if rubber banded placement, the watch became extremely (dangerously) warm, so we immediately disconnected it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Accessory for your watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's iWatch and it works great. Before his watch would sit on top of the charger and laid out on the desk. Honestly the way the charger cable would pull I thought his watch would end up on the floor. Now it sits upright on this stand and looks great. The stand has a sticker bottom also if you would like to stick it to a surface for even better control.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job but......
customer_reviews.text: There's not much to this product, but the one feature that I was happy about was the "sticky" rubberized bottom to hold it still on the nightstand. Sadly, after one night, I tried to lift and move it and found the rubber had torn off and stuck to my nightstand. I had to almost scrape it off. I would not recommend this for delicate wood surfaces. Then today, I picked it up and the whole sticky pad came off the cradle. It still works, but now it slides around a bit. For the price, it's not worth sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Apple Watch 4
customer_reviews.text: It says here in he Amazon listing that this stand ic compatible with the 44mm Apple Watch 4, but doesn't on the packaging. We all could use a little mystery in our lives, and so it was when I opened the box. To my great gratitude, it fits far better than my old, plastic stand from another manufacturer (which worked fine on my 42mm Series 1), while looking better and feeling more solid. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Puck won’t pop out if you use common sense
customer_reviews.text: Never mind the poor souls who don’t push the charging puck in hard enough, or haven’t removed the thin protective film from the puck. I ran into the issue where the puck falls out, and I found that my puck still had the film on it. Peeled it off and pushed it in and it’s FINE. It’s a great stand. Don’t listen to the 1 star reviews whining about it. They clearly have short attention spans. lol
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Faricy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, the item often doesn't work. The design flaw is that the charger circle does not push up through the hole far enough to "adhere" to the watch back, thus resulting in instances where you'll leave it there all night without any charge taking place. This can be rectified by simply using a lot of force to push it out, but it is clear that this is a design flaw and not what is intended. I would get something else
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging waaaaay easier - a necessity for your watch
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great--I don't have to fumble around with the charging cable anymore. Just set the watch on the stand and done. Bonus, it makes the screen visible when you tap it to check the time! The sticky material on the base keeps in firmly in place on my nightstand, too. I really like this thing, and wonder why the Apple Watch didn't come with something like it in the first place. It almost feels necessary, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: It’s well made but I still would not bother. About one out of every five charges at night results in waking up to a depleted battery. It’s probably because the magnet on the Apple charger is not made to work vertically, so periodically it slips just enough so that the charge is not taking. If I have to check that each night, I’d rather just lie it flat without the Spigen.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! The charger fits snugly into it, no wiggling about. My Apple Watch is a 40mm Series 5, so I had to use the little adhesive strip included to ensure that my watch wouldn’t come loose. If you don’t use the little strip, and your watch is 38/40mm, it will come loose. Use the strip, and problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: adil_shujaat@yahoo.com

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as designed
customer_reviews.text: The stand feels quality made. The primary issue is how the watch charger is secured into the stand. The charger body does not fit far enough into the stand opening to allow the watch to charge. I can push the charger body into place by force but it will not stay there. It always slides rearward away from the watch after only one or two minutes and the watch will stop charging. Basically, if I didn't devise a way to secure the charger into the stand it would be utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this trash. Spigen should stick to cases.
customer_reviews.text: I love Spigen products. Their cases are the best on the market. This stand is complete garbage. Over the past week of use, I have woken up to my watch being at 30% charge 4 times. I place the watch on the charger and the screen says it is charging, the nightstand mode is on. By the time I wake up in the morning the watch is still in the dock, but it didn't charge more than 5%. It's like the stand is slowly pushing the charger back out or it holds the watch too far away for the magnet to work. There is nothing wrong with my charger, it works fine when not in the charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Great idea just not for use with their Spigen Rugged Armor case
customer_reviews.text: While the product is well made and the TPU type silicon is nice and thick, it’s difficult to get my 44mm Apple Watch series 4 with the spigen rugged armor case to charge because of the thickness of the rugged armor case itself. Just keep in mind if you have a slightly thicker case on your Apple Watch like I do, it’s going to be a hit a miss game of charging and not charging forcing you to remove your Apple Watch case to ensure your device is being charged.
customer_reviews.author: krS

customer_reviews.title: Love that it stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Love that it stays in place. However that's where I take 2 stars off. I had it on my nightstand but when needing to move from the wood surface it is like its glued down. Once I gave it enough force to more it damaged the sticky pad leaving behind some of the pad on the nightstand!! Still worked and thought it might not stick so bad the next time. Nope. Almost as bad with just 50% of the sticky area left. After that move, it was no longer going to just stay in place with the pad as it was too messed up by that point.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: great charging stand BUT
customer_reviews.text: I just discovered that after several months on my bed nightstand , moving the base has left half the sticky base material on my expensive oak nightstand . Now the stand is unusable because half the adhesive is on the base , the other half stuck fast to the wood and IT'S NOT EASY to removes this little mess
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any bedside table/desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Its an amazing addition to my bed side desk, and allows the watch to be charged while facing me, so I can see the time. I use this daily, and its super simple to remove and place the watch. Even my 44mm watch with a the Spigen Rugged Armor Pro fits perfectly. Love the non-slip adhesive pad on the bottom as well. And the price beats all other apple watch stands out there, while allowing you to use your OEM charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: Mervin Gonsalves

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy watch stand.
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried about it staying on my wife's nightstand but it stays in place, even with stuff pushed against it. It does require that you use your existing charger and it would be cool I'd it came with it's own cord so you could free up your other one for travel or the office or something. But I can't really complain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

product_meta.title: Spigen S350 Designed for Apple Watch Stand for All Series 44mm / 42mm / 40mm / 38mm - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackSpigen's S350 Apple Watch Stand is made entirely of scratch-free TPU for minimal aesthetics packed with smart functionality. It features a bottom lip that cradles your watch on its side for stability that prevents your watch from swaying side to side. An exact charger cutout offers form-fitting precision that keeps things simple and easy to use.

Easily place and charge your watch with the strap open or closed
Apple Watch Stand Compatible with Apple Watch Series 5, Series 4, Series 3, 2, 1 / some cases or Spigen Tough Armor case for 42mm Apple Watch case may not be compatible.
Apple Watch Charger NOT INCLUDED. Patent Registered
